name: intercounty
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between or involving two or more counties (= political divisions of a country or state): On these occasions, inter-county rivalries, sometimes centuries old, are played out. They entered teams in the junior intercounty championships for the first time in years.
More examplesFewer examplesHave you tried your inter-county library loan service or departmental library?The 28-year-old has spent most of his intercounty career as a peripheral figure. The intercounty connector, a planned 18-mile toll highway, has drawn opposition from environmental groups.
